mapper.insert: insert into permission (permission_id, descr, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, enabled) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update permission set descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select permission_id, descr, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, enabled from permission
